name: Cafe Mania: Kitchen Cooking
description:
Do you like cooking, inventing new recipes and create cooking masterpieces? Do you want to be like a real cook? Or maybe you like to manage cafe and your vocation is to be a manager? Do you want to have your own restaurant? Are you fond of ice-cream, desserts, pizza and other tasty dishes? Do you like to eat and to feed other? A new Hippo kids cafe is launched especially for you!

Our Hippo kids cafe has a great variety of playing modes, unbelievable possibilities and different locations! Try a cup of coffee in the cozy sidewalk cafe. Visit restaurant, where you could try pizza. Prepare delicious desserts on the sweets fairy. Eat unique ice-cream on the sunny sea shore. Try to cook food in the noisy amusement park or in the forest during the picnic. You will have fun at all these places! You can play in a cooking mode, searching mode, serving mode and use for it different places. All three modes are connected wisely and they are interchangeable in that way, the playing process is not annoying and boring but only interesting. Are you bored with managing cafe and cooking? then serve clients and relax playing exciting searching game. It doesn't matter who you are manager or cook, are you interested in cooking or managing cafe - you will have fun and different interesting games dedicated to various topics!

Kids Hippo Cafe as well as all our educational games for boys and girls, is absolutely for free. Perform different funny tasks! Our Hippy invites you to a cup of coffee in her cozy restaurant. Stay tuned, stay with us and have fun playing our exciting educational games.
